node.title: Sam's Take: Morbius reviewed
node.description: Watch: This week Sam is looking at Sony's latest addition to their Spider-Man cinematic universe, Morbius.
node.content:
["Watch: This week Sam is looking at Sony's latest addition to their Spider-Man cinematic universe, Morbius. ", "", "
Jared Leto takes the main role in Morbius. Photo: YouTube/ Sony
", "Jared Leto stars as Dr Michael Morbius, a blood specialist who suffers from an incurable blood disease.", "His search for a cure results in him contracting a form of vampirism.", "Grappling with new abilities and a thirst for human blood, Morbius enlists the help of his colleague, Dr Martine Bancroft (Adria Arjona), while dealing with pressure from his surrogate brother, Milo (Matt Smith), who also suffers from the same deadly disease."]
